Title: How To Accomplish Greatness ï½œ Tao Te Ching Chapter 45 Explained
Content: Consider focusing on creating work that is intrinsically valuable rather than seeking recognition or profit. This approach can lead to more authentic and meaningful creations, free from the constraints of immediate gratification or fear of failure. Embrace the process of creation for its own sake, and trust that dedication to quality and beauty will naturally attract an audience over time.
